title: Dr. Johannes Vieweg, MD - Fort Lauderdale, FL | Urology on Doximity
author: Renal Cell Carcinoma Biology; Prognostic Factors; Therapeutic Targets
description: Dr. Johannes Vieweg, MD is a urologist in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.
cleaned_text: Dr. Vieweg is on Doximity As a Doximity member you'll join over two million verified healthcare professionals in a private, secure network. - Connect with other colleagues in the same hospital or clinic - Search all U.S. specialist profiles and refer a patient - Read the latest clinical news and earn CME/CEU credits Office3200 S University Dr Suite 1506 Fort Lauderdale, FL 33328Phone+1 954-262-1501 [Is this information wrong?](https://www.doximity.com/profile/2c366bf8-0fd5-4486-bf09-8b9a79be4906/correction_requests/new) Summary - Dr. Vieweg has longstanding leadership and management expertise in diverse academic health, biomedical research and training environments. Since February 2016, Dr. Vieweg has served as the inaugural Dean of the College of Allopathic Medicine at Nova Southeastern University in Fort Lauderdale in Florida. The new school received accreditation in 2017 and enrolled students since 2018. His ambitious vision includes establishing a world-class medical school by creating new and innovative models of research, education and healthcare delivery, with a focus on improving health in Florida and beyond. Skill sets: Health management, Health administration, Health education, Urology, Biomedical research, Phase I/II clinical trials, Drug discovery, Regulatory drug management, Health policy, Global education, Health diplomacy, Health Crisis Management, Health Analytics Education & Training -
